room_title: Escape room "Serial Killer Sleuth" by Hysterium Escapes in Fort Wayne
review: I took some out of town family here - we had a blast in the serial killer room. So much fun! We already want to go back!

room_title: Escape room "Serial Killer Sleuth" by Hysterium Escapes in Fort Wayne
review: These rooms are so difficult but fun! I recommend the serial killer room because it's amazing! You can tell the game master John loves that room the most & that makes it more fun!

room_title: Escape room "Serial Killer Sleuth" by Hysterium Escapes in Fort Wayne
review: This was our favorite escape room in FW. The secret agent room was very difficult and the first we haven't been able to beat. Looking forward to bringing new friends here!

room_title: Escape room "Serial Killer Sleuth" by Hysterium Escapes in Fort Wayne
review: The escapes are a blast, the staff is knowledgeable and enjoys making it fun for participants, and it's a unique experience. I recommend the serial killer sleuth room, but not for those faint of heart!

room_title: Escape room "Serial Killer Sleuth" by Hysterium Escapes in Fort Wayne
review: I have tried all the other escape rooms in Fort Wayne, and this one is by far the best. John was fantastic, and his sense of humor was right up my alley. The Serial Killer room had a great atmosphere. I wish there were more "horror" themed rooms. I cannot wait to try the rest of them!
